bobbin noun [C]
(RUBBISH)
bobbins [ U ] UK informal
something that you think is silly, stupid, not true, or very low in quality: You're talking bobbins. OK, so he's meant to be a genius and everything, but this song is bobbins. Synonym
rubbish
a very small amount; almost nothing: "What did you get for it?" "Bobbins."
More examplesFewer examplesShe always tells me I talk bobbins.It's all bobbins as far as I'm concerned.The show might have been bobbins, but you'll never forget the end credits.
